query: Can you help me get a report of domain cloudflare.com on VirusTotal? My key is my_api.

query: Add this comment on VirusTotal for the IP address 192.0.2.1: {"type": "comment", "attributes": {"text": "#suspicious activity observed"}}. My API key is XYZ987.

query: I need to comment on the IP 203.0.113.1 in VirusTotal. Here is my API key: GHI765. The comment to post is: {"type": "comment", "attributes": {"text": "#malware detected in traffic"}}
reference: vt_add_comment_to_ip_address(ip = "203.0.113.1", data = {"type": "comment", "attributes": {"text": "#malware detected in traffic"}}, x_apikey = "GHI765")
